short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Specflow Extension for Devtools that allows you to export tests directly from the Recorder panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Specflow Extension for Dev tools that allows you to export tests directly from the Recorder panel. Recorded script using chrome dev tool can be converted to BDD format using this extension.
